entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h near noon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
